-很痛
-我知道很痛

translation.en: -It hurts! -It's okay, baby.
translation.zh:
-很痛
-我知道很痛 没事的 宝贝 用力 你一定行

translation.en: -[doctor] Push for me. Come on. -Push.
translation.zh: 没事的 宝贝 用力 你一定行

translation.en: -[sobs, exhales] No! -Take a deep breath. In five, four…
translation.zh: 没事的 宝贝 用力 你一定行 深呼吸 五、四

translation.en: -Okay? Here you go. Breathe. -…three, two, one.
translation.zh:
-好吗？
-三、二、一

translation.en: -Push. Push harder, Gertie. Push harder. -[screams, sobs] No.
translation.zh: 用力 继续用力 葛蒂 再用力

translation.en: The baby's crowning. I can see her.
translation.zh: 我看到孩子的头了 再用力

translation.en: -I just need one more push. -Can you see her?
translation.zh:
我看到孩子的头了 再用力 -你看到她了？
-天哪！我看到她的头了！

translation.en: Holy shit! I can see the head.
translation.zh:
-你看到她了？
-天哪！我看到她的头了！

translation.en: [doctor] Come on. One more. Breathe. -In five, four… -Push! It's almost there, baby.
translation.zh:
-再来一次 呼吸
-用力！快了 宝贝

translation.en: -You're doing it. Push! -[doctor] …three, two, one.
translation.zh:
-就是这样 用力！
-…三、二、一

translation.en: -Push! -[screams]
translation.zh: 用力！

translation.en: [doctor] Here she comes! Here she comes!
translation.zh: 出来了！

translation.en: -Here she is. -[cries]
translation.zh: 来了！

translation.en: -Do you wanna cut the cord, dad? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你要来切断脐带吗 爸爸？
-嗯！

translation.en: [chuckles] Scissors, please.
translation.zh: 拿剪刀来

translation.en: Yes! [chuckles] And she's got all ten fingers, ten toes.
translation.zh: 嗯！她有十个手指 十个脚趾

translation.en: We'll get her all cleaned up and then we're gonna check…
translation.zh: 我们会把她洗干净 然后检查…

translation.en: -[EKG machine beeping] -Gertie?
translation.zh: 葛蒂？

translation.en: -[Ollie] Baby, look. -[doctor] Gertie?
translation.zh:
-宝贝 看
-葛蒂？

translation.en: Gertie!
translation.zh: 葛蒂！

translation.en: Gertie, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 葛蒂 你听得见我说的话吗？

translation.en: -She's okay-- Sweetheart? -[doctor] Nurse. Nurse, get Dr. Mortimer right away.
translation.zh:
-她没事 亲爱的？
-护士 快叫莫蒂默医生！

translation.en: [Ollie] She's just resting. Who's Dr. Mortimer?
translation.zh: 她睡着了 莫蒂默医生是谁？

translation.en: [nurse] Dr. Mortimer!
translation.zh: 莫蒂默医生！

translation.en: -[Ollie] What's happening? -[doctor] She's unresponsive.
translation.zh:
-怎么了？
-她昏迷了

translation.en: -Gertie! -Gertie! Gertie!
translation.zh:
-葛蒂！
-葛蒂！

translation.en: Gertie, Gertie, it's me! Gertie?
translation.zh: 是我 葛蒂！

translation.en: [doctor] Healthy baby. Unresponsive.
translation.zh: 孩子平安 产妇昏迷

translation.en: -Respiratory arrest. -[nurse] Turn it around!
translation.zh: 呼吸停止了

translation.en: What's happening to my wife? Let's open that IV, please.
translation.zh:
-我妻子怎么了？
-打开呼吸器

translation.en: Baby, are you okay? Sweetheart, sweetheart, wake up!
translation.zh: 宝贝 你好吗？亲爱的 醒醒！

translation.en: Please, someone take Mr. Trinke outside. Please!
translation.zh: 请带亭基先生出去！

translation.en: I'm gonna have to intubate.
translation.zh: 我来插管子

translation.en: Gertie, wake up, my love. Wake up.
translation.zh: 葛蒂 亲爱的 醒醒

translation.en: Gertie, please. Wake up.
translation.zh: 葛蒂 求求你 醒醒

translation.en: Get off me! Gertie! [speaks indistinctly]
translation.zh: 别碰我！葛蒂！

translation.en: I wanna stay with my wife! Gertie! Gertie!
translation.zh: 我要和我妻子在一起！葛蒂！

translation.en: What's happening? Somebody just tell me--
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: Ollie… Hey, if I don't get to go in there right now,
translation.zh:
-奥利！
-如果我现在不马上进去的话

translation.en: -I swear to God! -Ollie… Ollie,
translation.zh:
-我向上帝发誓！
-奥利 冷静

translation.en: -calm down. -Fuck you, calm down! Okay?
translation.zh: 去你妈的冷静！懂吗？

translation.en: I got dragged out of there, I haven't got to see my baby!
translation.zh: 我被人拉出来 还没看到我的孩子！

translation.en: Your baby is fine. She's healthy, she's normal.
translation.zh: 你的孩子很好 平安健康

translation.en: What's wrong with Gertie? What happened? I just-- I need you to calm down before I--
translation.zh:
-那葛蒂怎么了？
-我要你冷静下来

translation.en: Look, I'm calm! Okay?
translation.zh: 我冷静了！

translation.en: I'm calm.
translation.zh: 我冷静下来了

translation.en: We think Gertie had an aneurysm.
translation.zh: 我们发现葛蒂有一个动脉瘤

translation.en: Is she okay?
translation.zh: 她没事吧？

translation.en: We lost her, Ollie.
translation.zh: 她走了 奥利

translation.en: The strain of the contractions and the pushing must have caused the aneurysm to rupture.
translation.zh: 宫缩的张力和推挤使得动脉瘤破裂了

translation.en: There are rarely symptoms for aneurysms…
translation.zh: 动脉瘤往往没有任何先兆

translation.en: ♪ That's how I knew the story Would break my heart ♪
translation.zh: （亭基）

translation.en: [Ollie] You sure you're okay with this, Dad?
translation.zh: 爸 你肯定你能行吗？

translation.en: What okay? She's my granddaughter.
translation.zh: 当然 她是我孙女！

translation.en: -[baby cries] -Yeah, you can stay with me anytime, can't you?
translation.zh: 你可以一直和我在一起 对吗？

translation.en: Yes, you can.
translation.zh: 是的 你可以

translation.en: Until you're a teenager, with the boys and the reefer.
translation.zh:
直到你长大了
才去和男孩子在一起抽大麻

translation.en: -Then I don't wanna know about you. -[coos]
translation.zh: 到那个时候我就不理你了

translation.en: I wouldn't impose on you, you know.
translation.zh: 我不想强迫你

translation.en: I just got a lot of work piled up from, uh, before and…
translation.zh: 我有很多工作…很久没处理了

translation.en: -I'll be back late tonight, okay? -[Bart] Yeah, take your time.
translation.zh: 我今天晚上要晚些回来 可以吗？ 嗯 别着急

translation.en: Your daddy really misses your mommy, kid.
translation.zh:
你爸爸真的很想念你的妈妈
宝贝

translation.en: I miss her too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Especially right now.
translation.zh: 尤其是现在

translation.en: -[baby farts] -Oh, Jesus! [exhales]
translation.zh: 噢 我的上帝！

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: -You wanted to see me, Ollie? -Yeah, come on in.
translation.zh:
-你要见我 奥利？
-对 进来

translation.en: I didn't think you were gonna be in this week.
translation.zh:
我没想到你这个星期就回来了
你怎么样？

translation.en: How you doing, man? You… you all right?
translation.zh:
我没想到你这个星期就回来了
你怎么样？ -你还好吗？
-我很好

translation.en: I'm… I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-我很好

translation.en: Look, this piece in the Post.
translation.zh:
看看这篇报道
为什么你不打电话告诉我？

translation.en: Why didn't you call me when this broke? I had to read about it in New Jersey.
translation.zh:
看看这篇报道
为什么你不打电话告诉我？ -我在新泽西的时候就应该先读一下
-我读过了 那个护士是个歌迷

translation.en: I covered it, Ollie. It's cool. The nurse is a fan.
translation.zh:
-我在新泽西的时候就应该先读一下
-我读过了 那个护士是个歌迷

translation.en: Will she still be a fan when the Enquirer flashes a stack of fifties in her face?
translation.zh:
如果《娱乐杂志》扔给她一大把硬币
她还会是个歌迷吗？

translation.en: Listen, something like this breaks, I'm not in the city,
translation.zh:
听着 如果这样的事情发生了
而我不在这里

translation.en: you find me or you find another job.
translation.zh: 你必须告诉我 不然你就另谋高就吧

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 嗯 知道了

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: 行吧

translation.en: What else do we got?
translation.zh: 还有什么新闻？

translation.en: Um, Will Smith.
translation.zh: 嗯 威尔·史密斯

translation.en: Who? The Fresh Prince?
translation.zh:
-谁？
-活力王子？

translation.en: DJ Jazzy Jeff and the Fresh Prince, Fresh Prince?
translation.zh:
“DJ杰西·杰夫和活力王子”
里面的活力王子？

translation.en: -[Arthur] Yeah. -What about him?
translation.zh:
-对
-他怎么了？

translation.en: Well, uh, you remember the first album,
translation.zh:
你记得第一张专辑
就是有“女孩不…”

translation.en: -with "Girls Ain’t Nothing but Trouble"? -Rock the House. Yeah?
translation.zh:
你记得第一张专辑
就是有“女孩不…” -“大闹天宫” 对吗？
-“大闹天宫” 对

translation.en: Rock the House. Right.
translation.zh:
-“大闹天宫” 对吗？
-“大闹天宫” 对

translation.en: Well, uh, you remember on the cover of… of the album Jazzy Jeff is… is holding a model of a house?
translation.zh:
你记得专辑封面上
杰西·杰夫拿着一个房子的模型吗？

translation.en: Vaguely.
translation.zh: 好像是的

translation.en: Well, Will Smith is donating that house to the Hard Rock Cafe.
translation.zh:
威尔·史密斯把这个房子
捐给了硬石咖啡店

translation.en: Well, stop the presses. You put the word out yet?
translation.zh: 好了 就这样 你发出去了吗？

translation.en: Date pending, yeah.
translation.zh:
-时间还没决定
-有人要这条新闻吗？

translation.en: -Anybody give a shit? -Every outlet wants in.
translation.zh:
-时间还没决定
-有人要这条新闻吗？ 好多媒体都要

translation.en: -You're kidding me. -[Arthur] No.
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑？

translation.en: Even US News & World Report.
translation.zh:
没有 连《美国新闻》和
《世界报道》都要了

translation.en: Why? It's an eight-year-old album.
translation.zh: 为什么？这张专辑是8年前的事情了

translation.en: Doesn't matter. Everyone loves that Fresh Prince TV show.
translation.zh:
这没关系
大家都喜欢《活力王子》那部电视剧

translation.en: He… he's got that movie coming out in a couple of weeks, uh, Independence Day.
translation.zh:
他的新电影几个星期后就要上映了
《独立日》

translation.en: Well, then, kick it up to 30. Let the film division handle it. No, we can't.
translation.zh:
-那就让电影部门去处理吧
-不 我们不能这样

translation.en: Will wants to keep his music career separate from his movie career.
translation.zh:
威尔想让自己的音乐事业
和电影事业分开发展

translation.en: Like the Fresh Prince of Bel Air is ever gonna have a movie career.
translation.zh:
就凭那个活力王子
也能开创自己的电影事业？

translation.en: All right. Get me everything you can. I'll put together a press kit on him, and we'll just do it.
translation.zh:
尽你所能找到一切
我来组织一下 就这样吧

translation.en: -Okay. -Patty, get me Kirsch.
translation.zh:
好的 -帕蒂 给我接科斯
-好的 奥利

translation.en: [Patty through telephone] Sure, Ollie.
translation.zh:
-帕蒂 给我接科斯
-好的 奥利

translation.en: You know, Ollie, I can handle this, uh, Fresh Prince stuff if… if you wanna take a couple of days…
translation.zh:
如果你要休息几天
我可以处理好活力王子的事情

translation.en: Hey, Arthur, I can do my job. I'm all set, okay? You do your job. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 嗨 亚瑟 我没事 你忙你的 去吧

translation.en: Patty, did you not hear me? l asked you to please get Kirsch on the phone.
translation.zh:
帕蒂 你没听见吗？
我要你帮我接科斯

translation.en: -Ollie? -[Patty] I'm trying.
translation.zh:
-奥利？
-我正在接

translation.en: What, man?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I… I know I told you at the funeral, but I'm… I'm really sorry…
translation.zh:
我知道葬礼的时候说过了
我真的很难过

translation.en: I'm fine! Okay, Arthur? I am fine. Please go do what I asked you to do now.
translation.zh: 我很好 知道了吗？ 现在去做我叫你做的事情吧

translation.en: -[Patty] Kirschner on one. -Okay, put him on the phone, then!
translation.zh:
-科斯在一号线上
-好 接过来！

translation.en: -Hey, how's the baby? -The baby is fine, Arthur!
translation.zh:
-孩子怎么样？
-她很好 亚瑟！

translation.en: Forget about the baby! I just wanna do my job!
translation.zh: 别说什么孩子了！我只想好好工作！

translation.en: [Kirschner] Jesus Christ, Ollie! What the hell you screaming about?
translation.zh: 上帝啊 奥利！你在叫什么啊？

translation.en: -Patty, was that-- -[telephone beeps]
translation.zh: 帕蒂 那是…

translation.en: on that right now, Arthur. Don't worry about that.
translation.zh: 我正在努力 别担心

translation.en: Just get there early and deal with the menu, okay?
translation.zh: 早点去点菜 知道吗？

translation.en: -[baby crying] -Hey! Are you deaf? The kid is crying up there.
translation.zh: 嗨 你聋了吗？孩子在那里哭呢！

translation.en: Yeah. Can you deal with that? I'm doing something important right here, Dad, okay? Thanks.
translation.zh:
你能帮忙一下吗？
我有重要的事情！谢谢你

translation.en: What the hell could be more important than your kid crying?
translation.zh: 还有什么比你的孩子哭更重要的？

translation.en: I have a memorabilia donation ceremony in the morning
translation.zh: 我明天有一个捐赠仪式

translation.en: that my company is treating like a… a… a royal wedding
translation.zh:
我们公司非常重视
就像皇室婚礼那样

translation.en: 'cause apparently the client's the most beloved American musician -since Elvis Presley, all right? -[baby continues crying]
translation.zh:
因为嘉宾将是猫王以来
最受欢迎的美国音乐家

translation.en: The kid's been screaming for the last ten minutes.
translation.zh: 那孩子已经哭了10分钟了

translation.en: If it bothers you so much, go up there and give her a bottle, okay?
translation.zh:
如果她吵到你了
就上去给她个奶瓶 好吗？

translation.en: Sorry. It's a nightmare trying to work at this house. Um…
translation.zh: 抱歉 在这里工作真是糟糕透了

translation.en: Jesus! Let me call you back, okay?
translation.zh: 上帝！我等会再打给你 好吗？

translation.en: What, Dad?
translation.zh:
-怎么了 爸爸？
-听着 孩子

translation.en: Listen, kid. I lost a wife too, remember?
translation.zh:
-怎么了 爸爸？
-听着 孩子 我也曾经失去妻子 记得吗？
所以我知道你的感受 振作起来

translation.en: So I get how you're feeling. But come on.
translation.zh:
我也曾经失去妻子 记得吗？
所以我知道你的感受 振作起来

translation.en: You were married for what, 20 years? I got about 20 minutes.
translation.zh:
你们结婚了多久 20年？
我呢？才20分钟

translation.en: So you don't "get" how I'm feeling at all, okay?
translation.zh:
所以你根本不“理解”我的感受
明白吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry, Oliver, but that don't change the fact that you're a goddamn father now
translation.zh:
对不起 奥利弗
但是这也改变不了你是父亲的事实！

translation.en: and you haven't acted like it since that kid got home from the hospital.
translation.zh:
自从孩子从回来以后
你还没做过父亲该做的事情！

translation.en: I been calling in sick for a month to do the things you're supposed to be doing.
translation.zh:
我请假一个月
都在做你应该做的事情！

translation.en: Jesus Christ, if Gertie could see the shit you've been pulling…
translation.zh:
我的上帝
如果葛蒂看到你现在的样子

translation.en: Gertie doesn't see anything anymore, Dad. She's dead.
translation.zh: 葛蒂再也看不到了 爸爸 她死了

translation.en: -[baby crying continuously] -Yeah, she's dead.
translation.zh: 对 她死了

translation.en: But you ain't. And neither is that kid.
translation.zh: 但是你没有 孩子也没有

translation.en: Yeah. It's nothing. Uh…
translation.zh: 嗯 没什么

translation.en: All right, so I'm gonna do the kit.
translation.zh: 好的 我会做的 马上就完成了

translation.en: It's almost finished. You deal with the menu. We'll--
translation.zh: 好的 我会做的 马上就完成了 你负责菜单 威尔什么时候到？

translation.en: Yeah. What time does Will get there? Okay.
translation.zh: 你负责菜单 威尔什么时候到？

translation.en: -[baby crying] -Dad, the baby's up!
translation.zh: 爸 孩子醒了！

translation.en: Dad, the baby needs to be fed!
translation.zh: 爸！孩子要吃奶了！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: [Bart] What the hell?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Are you nuts? What, are you trying to get killed?
translation.zh: 你发疯了？你想自杀？

translation.en: What are you doing? Searching for Christ. What does it look like I'm doing?
translation.zh:
-你在干什么？
-寻找耶稣 不然我像在干什么？

translation.en: It would have been nice if you'd told me you were leaving the house, Dad.
translation.zh: 你出门的时候最好和我说一声 爸

translation.en: That way, I could've given you the baby instead of driving all the way down here.
translation.zh:
这样我可以把孩子交给你
而不是一路开车来这里！

translation.en: Now I'm gonna hit traffic. No, you ain't giving me the baby.
translation.zh:
-这下我要遇到塞车了！
-不 你不能把孩子给我

translation.en: Hey! Excuse me?
translation.zh: 嗨！你说什么？

translation.en: I got uptown and downtown to do this morning.
translation.zh: 我今天很忙

translation.en: You're on your own with the kid today. What? No!
translation.zh:
-今天你自己带孩子
-什么？不！

translation.en: I have this press conference l have to do this morning. Dad, you know that.
translation.zh:
我今天早上要开记者会 爸！
你知道的！

translation.en: I got a job to do too. This is not funny. I'm not kidding. If I don't leave right now…
translation.zh:
-我也有自己的工作
-如果我现在不马上去的话

translation.en: -So leave. -And do what with the baby?
translation.zh:
-那就快去！
-那孩子怎么办？

translation.en: -Take her with you. -Goddamnit! I--
translation.zh:
-带上她！
-妈的！我…

translation.en: All right look, I… I know I haven't been helping out that much with the baby…
translation.zh: 我知道我对孩子不够好

translation.en: Listen to you. "Helping out that much with the baby."
translation.zh: 听听你说的“对孩子不够好”

translation.en: She's your daughter, for Chrissake!
translation.zh: 她可是你的女儿 我的上帝

translation.en: What the hell am I supposed to do with her? Try acting like her father, shithead!
translation.zh:
-我现在该怎么办？
-有点当爸爸的样子 你个混蛋

translation.en: Goddamnit!
translation.zh: 我靠！

translation.en: Folks, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 伙计们 对不起

translation.en: Sorry. Steve.
translation.zh: 对不起 史蒂夫

translation.en: What the…
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: I ordered diapers. Did they get here yet? You mean, like, baby diapers?
translation.zh:
-我买了尿布 他们送来了吗？
-你是说孩子用的尿布？

translation.en: [Ollie] Why didn't you start this half an hour ago?
translation.zh:
你为什么不半个小时前就开始呢？
你不该等我的！

translation.en: -You shouldn't have waited. -We're not waiting for you.
translation.zh:
你为什么不半个小时前就开始呢？
你不该等我的！ -我们没在等你 是在等威尔
-威尔还没有来？

translation.en: -We're waiting for Will. -Will's not here?
translation.zh:
-我们没在等你 是在等威尔
-威尔还没有来？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh:
-没有
-你是不是“停鸡”？

translation.en: -Either of you guys Trinket? -Close enough.
translation.zh:
-没有
-你是不是“停鸡”？ -我是 他在哪里？
-我们也不知道

translation.en: -Where is he? -Ah, we're not sure.
translation.zh:
-我是 他在哪里？
-我们也不知道

translation.en: Damn, that baby smells like shit. You know that, right?
translation.zh: 那个孩子都发臭了 你知道吗？

translation.en: [Arthur] It's a good thing you finally showed up.
translation.zh: 你可算来了 太好了

translation.en: They… they're getting all rowdy out there. -Oh, Mother of God! -[baby crying]
translation.zh:
-他们都要暴动了
-噢！我的上帝！

translation.en: -What? Jesus… -Ollie!
translation.zh:
-怎么了？上帝
-奥利

translation.en: Ollie, the guy from Rolling Stone-- Holy shit! What is that smell?
translation.zh:
奥利 那个《滚石》杂志的人…
天哪 这是什么味道？

translation.en: Oh, grow up, Susan. It's a dirty diaper. What did the Rolling Stone guy say?
translation.zh:
成熟点 苏珊 是尿布的味道
《滚石》的人说什么了？

translation.en: If we don't start in five minutes, they're leaving
translation.zh: 如果我们再不开始 他们就走了

translation.en: to go cover the Blues Traveler signing at Tower.
translation.zh: 就转去报道乐队签售会了

translation.en: Jesus Christ! Hey, you're doing that wrong.
translation.zh:
-上帝！
-嗨！这样不对！

translation.en: -What? -You're doing that wrong.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-这样包不对！

translation.en: You're supposed to wipe front to back. You're wiping back to front.
translation.zh:
你应该从前面包到后面
你搞反了

translation.en: You do that, you're just wiping the poop into her…
translation.zh: 你这样把大便包进了她的…

translation.en: crevice.
translation.zh: “裂缝”里去了

translation.en: Get outta here. Beat it.
translation.zh: 快走吧！离远点

translation.en: Mark my words, you're gonna give her the crotch-rot.
translation.zh: 记住我的话吧 不然你会害她得病的

translation.en: -Would one of you do-- You do this. -Oh, not me. No.
translation.zh:
-你们可以帮我 你来吧
-噢 别叫我 不

translation.en: Will you do this so I can calm them down?
translation.zh:
你帮我对付一下
我去让大家安静下来

translation.en: Why, because I'm a girl? I've never even seen a naked baby. No!
translation.zh:
就因为我是女的？
我从没见过裸体的婴儿 我不干！

translation.en: Fine. Thank you very much. I'm gonna remember this.
translation.zh: 那好 谢谢你 我会记住的

translation.en: -How much of this am I supposed to use? -Should I get that guy back?
translation.zh:
-我该用多少？
-我是不是应该叫那个人回来？

translation.en: He sounded like he knew a lot about changing babies.
translation.zh: 感觉他很懂怎么给小孩换尿布

translation.en: If it's for the smell, I suggest you use a lot.
translation.zh:
如果是为了遮盖臭味
最好用很多

translation.en: Ooh, you gotta turn… turn it. Turn it. You gotta turn the top!
translation.zh: 噢！你应该拧开 把盖子拧开！

translation.en: -Direct it at the baby. -Thank you, Susan.
translation.zh:
-噢！对准孩子！
-我谢谢你啊 苏珊

translation.en: Go out there, please, and tell them we're about to start.
translation.zh:
请到外面去
告诉大家马上就要开始了！

translation.en: I… I'd say more.
translation.zh: 我觉得还要更多

translation.en: That's a lot.
translation.zh: 太多了

translation.en: -[song concludes] -All right, the Fresh Prince is almost here.
translation.zh: 活力王子马上就来了

translation.en: Is that blow on your shirt?
translation.zh: 你衬衫上是可卡因吗？

translation.en: What do you think, Stretch? This is show business, right?
translation.zh:
你觉得呢？
我们娱乐圈的不都这样吗？

translation.en: That was a joke, people. Where's the Fresh Prince?
translation.zh:
-我在开玩笑
-活力王子人呢？

translation.en: -The Fresh Prince is on his way. -[baby crying]
translation.zh: 活力王子正在路上

translation.en: -It's crying. Will you take it? -No! No.
translation.zh:
-她哭了 你能抱一下吗？
-不！

translation.en: -Is that Jazzy Jeff? -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 那个是杰西·杰夫吗？

translation.en: This is bullshit! Where's the Fresh Prince?
translation.zh: 真是胡搞 活力王子在哪？

translation.en: Will someone please shut that girl up?
translation.zh: 有人能哄一下那个小女孩吗？

translation.en: Enough with the Romper Room, man. Bring out the Fresh Prince!
translation.zh:
马戏表演够了 拜托！
叫活力王子出来吧！

translation.en: -Fresh Prince! -[all chant] Fresh Prince! Fresh Prince!
translation.zh: 活力王子！

translation.en: Please take her.
translation.zh: 抱一下她

translation.en: I…
translation.zh: 我…嗯…

translation.en: Goddamnit! Just give her to me! Give me the baby.
translation.zh: 可恶！把她给我！把孩子给我

translation.en: -[all] Fresh Prince! Fresh Prince! -That's not a good idea.
translation.zh: 这可不是个好主意

translation.en: Would you people just shut the hell up with the "Fresh Prince" already?
translation.zh:
你们可以他妈的
别再叫“活力王子”了吗？

translation.en: He's a two-bit TV actor
translation.zh: 他只是个电视演员

translation.en: who won't be around any longer than it takes for the ink to dry
translation.zh:
人家没工夫等你们这些变态
写什么垃圾文章

translation.en: on the pages of the worthless rags you jerk-offs write for!
translation.zh: 他待不了多久的！

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: -That guy's toast. -That's a hell of a quote.
translation.zh:
-这家伙死定了
-这话要记下来

translation.en: It's all right, Arthur. It's all right.
translation.zh: 没事的 亚瑟

translation.en: We won't be here too long, Dad, you know, we'll be out of your hair
translation.zh: 我们不会待很久的 爸爸 我一找到新工作马上就搬走

translation.en: as soon as I get another job.
translation.zh: 我一找到新工作马上就搬走

translation.en: I have some feelers out to the other firms right now.
translation.zh: 我正在和一些公司接触

translation.en: As soon as this whole thing blows over…
translation.zh: 当这件事情的风波过去…

translation.en: Well, it's okay to stay here as long as you need to, till you get back on your feet.
translation.zh:
如果需要 你可以一直待在这里
直到你找到工作

translation.en: -I appreciate that. -On one condition.
translation.zh:
-我很感激
-有一个条件

translation.en: Yeah, here we go.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: You put the kid to bed every night.
translation.zh: 你每天晚上要哄孩子睡觉

translation.en: -That's it? -[Bart] For starters.
translation.zh:
-就这样？
-只是开始

translation.en: -[sighs] -And no whores.
translation.zh:
-就这样？
-只是开始 不许找女人 我的房子不许妓女进来

translation.en: I don't want no whores in my house.
translation.zh: 不许找女人 我的房子不许妓女进来

translation.en: I'm not really a whoremonger, Dad.
translation.zh: 我可不是嫖客 爸爸

translation.en: Here, the kid gets this.
translation.zh: 这个 给孩子

translation.en: That's cute. Eight o'clock you both get a bottle.
translation.zh:
真有意思
每天晚上8点 你们俩都有喝的

translation.en: [chuckles sarcastically] Just shut the hell up and go be a father, would you, please?
translation.zh: 闭嘴 去做父亲该做的事情吧

translation.en: [Ollie] No?
translation.zh: 不喝吗？

translation.en: Yeah, this is only temporary, us, you know,
translation.zh: 嗯 只是暂时的 你知道

translation.en: living with your grandfather here.
translation.zh: 和你爷爷住在这里

translation.en: [clicks tongue] So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: How about that Fresh Prince thing, huh?
translation.zh: 活力王子那档子事真闹大了 对吧？

translation.en: -It was quite a show. -[coos]
translation.zh: 搞得一团糟

translation.en: Your dad's one big horse's ass.
translation.zh: 你爸爸是个大蠢货

translation.en: Daddy's ex-bosses said the guys who did PR for Hitler
translation.zh: 爸爸以前的老板说希特勒的公关秘书

translation.en: have a better chance of working in this business again than Daddy does.
translation.zh: 干这行都会比你爸爸干得好

translation.en: So, okay…
translation.zh: 所以 好吧

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: 你怎么样？

translation.en: You know, you kinda look like your mom.
translation.zh: 你看上去和你妈妈很像

translation.en: Like a squishier, balder version of your mom.
translation.zh: 像秃头微缩版的妈妈

translation.en: Man,
translation.zh: 孩子啊…

translation.en: I just wish you could've gotten to meet your mom.
translation.zh: 我真希望你可以见到你妈妈

translation.en: I know she wanted to meet you… in a big, bad way.
translation.zh: 我知道她也想见你 无论什么代价

translation.en: In a big, bad way.
translation.zh: 无论什么代价

translation.en: Sometimes, Daddy wishes he'd have died instead of Mommy.
translation.zh:
有时候 爸爸希望是自己死了
而不是妈妈

translation.en: Because Mommy never would've…
translation.zh: 因为妈妈从来不会…

translation.en: let work get in the way of
translation.zh: 对待工作比对待你更认真

translation.en: getting to know you, like Daddy has for the last… month or so.
translation.zh:
不会像爸爸在过去的一个月里
那样不管你

translation.en: It's just that Daddy, he didn't expect Mommy…
translation.zh: 只是爸爸 他没想到妈妈会…

translation.en: [sighs] …to leave the way she did.
translation.zh: 那样离开

translation.en: [sighs] It's just really, really hard on Daddy, who's been trying to fill up his days with work,
translation.zh: 这对爸爸太难了 所以他整天工作

translation.en: so he wouldn't have to think about Mommy… [sobs] …never being around again.
translation.zh: 这样他就可以不想起妈妈

translation.en: I just loved your mom so much. You know?
translation.zh: 我太爱你的妈妈了 你知道吗？

translation.en: She really lit my world on fire. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 她点燃了我生命的火焰

translation.en: When that happens…
translation.zh: 那个时候…

translation.en: you kinda think it'll go on like that until one of you dies.
translation.zh:
你会觉得这火焰将永恒不熄
你知道吗？

translation.en: You know? You just don't expect… [sobs]
translation.zh:
你会觉得这火焰将永恒不熄
你知道吗？ 你只是无法预料到…

translation.en: I miss her so much. So, so much.
translation.zh: 我太想她了 非常想她

translation.en: And you're a little piece of Mommy, you know, and that makes you really special to Daddy.
translation.zh:
你是妈妈的一部分
所以你对爸爸非常重要

translation.en: [Ollie] Just don't go anywhere.
translation.zh: 什么地方都别去

translation.en: 'Cause you're the next best thing to Mommy, and I love you so much,
translation.zh:
你是除妈妈以外
对我最重要的了 我爱你

translation.en: and I'll always be here for you,
translation.zh: 我会一直在你身边

translation.en: and I'm sorry about the way I've been acting.
translation.zh: 以前所做的事 我很抱歉

translation.en: I promise you… I'll be better now.
translation.zh: 我保证 我以后会很好的

translation.en: I'm gonna be the best daddy in the world.
translation.zh: 我要做天下最好的爸爸

translation.en: 'Cause that's what Mommy wanted. And that's what you deserve.
translation.zh:
因为妈妈要我这样
也是你应该得到的

translation.en: And that's all I am now.
translation.zh: 我要全心全意做

translation.en: [exhales] I'm just your dad.
translation.zh: 你的爸爸

translation.en: Your dad likes to run off at the mouth sometimes, I know.
translation.zh:
你爸爸有的时候
喜欢信口开河 我知道

translation.en: Your mother wasn't a fan, either. -[coos] -[Ollie chuckles]
translation.zh: 你妈妈也不喜欢

translation.en: You wanna see a picture of your mom? I have one.
translation.zh: 你想看看妈妈的照片吗？我有一张

translation.en: This was your mommy. She was really pretty.
translation.zh: 这是你妈妈 她非常漂亮

translation.en: Okay. You can keep it.
translation.zh: 你可以留着

translation.en: Daddy's got a bunch.
translation.zh: 爸爸还有好多

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: Good night, Gertie.
translation.zh: 晚安 葛蒂

translation.en: -[school bell ringing] -[children shouting]
translation.zh: （葛蒂七岁）

translation.en: [Ollie] Gertie!
translation.zh: 葛蒂！

translation.en: Your chariot awaits, Princess. Let's go.
translation.zh: 你的车子来了 公主 我们走吧！

translation.en: We gotta go! Come on! Argh!
translation.zh: 我们走吧！啊！

translation.en: [Ollie] How was school? Good?
translation.zh:
-学校里好吗？
-嗯

translation.en: -You have a nice time? -Yep.
translation.zh:
-开心吗？
-嗯

translation.en: [Ollie] Remember to put your seat belt on.
translation.zh: 系上安全带 知道在哪里吗？

translation.en: -Know where to find it? -[Gertie] Yep.
translation.zh: 系上安全带 知道在哪里吗？ 嗯

translation.en: [Ollie] Lock and load.
translation.zh: 锁好 准备好

translation.en: Coming around.
translation.zh: 我过来了

translation.en: Get ready.
translation.zh: 准备好哦

translation.en: -Ready? -[Gertie] Punch it, Chewie.
translation.zh:
-准备好了？
-出发吧！

translation.en: -Can we go see Cats? -Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
-我们可以去看音乐剧《猫》吗？
-不行

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because Cats was the second worst thing that ever happened to New York City.
translation.zh: 《猫》是纽约第二糟糕的东西

translation.en: Besides, Cats closed three years ago. We never do anything cool.
translation.zh:
-而且 3年前就不再演出了
-我们从来都没做过有意思的事情！

translation.en: Oh, you're riding in the Batmobile, aren't you? How cool is that?
translation.zh:
你正坐在蝙蝠侠的车子里
还不够酷吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Look, no one's more depressed than me that driving the street sweeper
translation.zh: 瞧 没有人比我更悲伤

translation.en: is considered the height of excitement in my life.
translation.zh: 我把开清洁车当成生命中的享受了

translation.en: I used to live in New York City.
translation.zh: 我以前住在纽约

translation.en: I could've gone to see Cats three times a day.
translation.zh: 可以一天看三次《猫》

translation.en: It's not like I ever ask for anything.
translation.zh: 我从来都没有求你要过什么

translation.en: And the Oscar goes to Gertie Trinke,
translation.zh: 奥斯卡得主：葛蒂·亭基

translation.en: for her performance in Laying It On Thick For My Old Man.
translation.zh: 她在《向老爸吐槽》中表演出色

translation.en: What is it with you and Cats all of a sudden?
translation.zh: 为什么你突然想看《猫》？

translation.en: I wanna sing a Cats song in the big show like everybody else.
translation.zh:
因为我想在演出里唱一首
《猫》里的歌 就像其他人一样

translation.en: -What big show? -There's gonna be this big show at school.
translation.zh:
-什么演出？
-学校要搞一次大型演出

translation.en: All the people have to sing a song with people from their family.
translation.zh:
所有人都要和自己的家人
一起唱一首歌

translation.en: Are you inviting me to this big show? Duh! Yeah, you and Pop too.
translation.zh:
-你是在邀请我去吗？
-嗯！你还有爷爷

translation.en: Oh-ho, I'm sure that'll go over huge with your Pop.
translation.zh: 噢！你爷爷一定开心死了

translation.en: Can Uncle Greenie and Uncle Block be in it too?
translation.zh:
格里尼叔叔和布洛克叔叔
可以一起来吗？

translation.en: Those men are not your uncles.
translation.zh:
他们可不是你的叔叔
连你的亲戚都不是

translation.en: -They're barely even your peers. -Pee-ers? [chuckles]
translation.zh:
他们可不是你的叔叔
连你的亲戚都不是 小便的人？

translation.en: When is this big show? Right before Thanksgiving break.
translation.zh:
-演出是什么时候？
-感恩节放假前

translation.en: Does it have to be something from the Bible?
translation.zh: 节目要和《圣经》有关吗？

translation.en: I don't think so. Is Cats in the Bible?
translation.zh: 不用吧 《圣经》里有猫吗？

translation.en: The Satanic Bible, yes.
translation.zh: 魔鬼的圣经里大概有吧

translation.en: What? When you gonna take the kid to see the Cats?
translation.zh:
-怎么了？
-你什么时候带她去看《猫》？

translation.en: Jesus. You too?
translation.zh: 天哪 你也问？

translation.en: Gertie!
translation.zh: 葛蒂！

translation.en: Do you even know what Cats is, Dad?
translation.zh: 你知道《猫》是什么东西吗 爸爸？

translation.en: What, I don't read the papers? You don't read that paper.
translation.zh:
-什么？你以为我不看报纸吗？
-你不读那样的报纸

translation.en: What are you doing with the New York Times?
translation.zh: 你拿着《纽约时报》干什么？

translation.en: They ran out of the Ledger.
translation.zh: 其他报纸卖完了

translation.en: They don't have the jumble in the Times, Dad.
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》从来不会胡说的 爸爸

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: -Where were you? -I was in the bathroom.
translation.zh:
-你去哪里了？
-我在洗手间

translation.en: Uh-huh. Why didn't I hear the toilet flush? Oh, I forgot. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-为什么我没有听到冲水的声音
-噢 我忘记了

translation.en: Yeah, okay, march your butt back upstairs and flush that toilet.
translation.zh: 好 向后转上楼去冲水

translation.en: And when I say "no" about something,
translation.zh: 还有 当我说“不”的时候

translation.en: like, I don't know, Cats, maybe, I mean no, okay?
translation.zh:
就像说起《猫》的时候
我的意思就是“不” 明白了？

translation.en: Pop, you were supposed to be subtle! Why do you teach her words like that?
translation.zh:
-爷爷 你应该再聪明一点的
-你为什么教她这么说话？

translation.en: You're gonna have to mow the park for me tomorrow. I can't do it.
translation.zh: 你明天要帮我去扫公园 我不能去了

translation.en: Why the hell not? I have an appointment in the city at 11:00.
translation.zh:
-为什么不能？
-我11点有个面试

translation.en: Jesus, kid, why do you keep doing it to yourself?
translation.zh:
上帝啊 孩子
为什么你一直这么对待自己？

translation.en: How many of these interviews you gotta go on
translation.zh: 你还要去面试几次啊？

translation.en: before you get it through your thick head
translation.zh: 到最后一败涂地

translation.en: they don't want you in that business anymore?
translation.zh: 他们不再要你干这行了！

translation.en: For Chrissakes, you made fun of that Prince Charles guy.
translation.zh: 因为你开了那个什么王子的玩笑！

translation.en: -[toilet flushing] -Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: First of all, Dad, I didn't make fun of anybody.
translation.zh: 首先 爸 我没有开任何人的玩笑

translation.en: I made one remark about Will Smith, the Fresh Prince.
translation.zh:
我只是说了一句
关于活力王子威尔·史密斯的话

translation.en: Sooner or later, everyone's gonna forget about that,
translation.zh: 人们迟早会忘记的

translation.en: and I'm gonna go back to doing what I'm really good at,
translation.zh: 然后我就会回去做我真正擅长的事情

translation.en: instead of sweeping streets
translation.zh: 而不是扫地、扫雪和捡垃圾

translation.en: and plowing snow and picking up garbage. Okay?
translation.zh: 而不是扫地、扫雪和捡垃圾 明白了？

translation.en: Well, if you're going into the city anyway, at least take the kid to see the Cats.
translation.zh:
如果你真的要回城市
那至少带她去看一次《猫》吧

translation.en: [Ollie sighs] Oh, God…
translation.zh: 噢 天啊…

translation.en: I'll tell you what. Since there is no more Cats,
translation.zh: 你知道吗 因为《猫》不再上演了

translation.en: Gertie, why don't you come on over here and pick out another play that you wanna see, all right?
translation.zh:
葛蒂 你为什么不来看看
再选一个你想看的表演呢？

translation.en: Look through here. Anything you want. Go nuts.
translation.zh: 看看这里 任何一个都可以

translation.en: The Cats is a show? [scoffs] Yeah, you read the papers.
translation.zh:
-《猫》是场演出？
-嗯 你说你看了报纸的

translation.en: You think you're slick, don't you, young lady?
translation.zh: 你觉得你很狡猾 对吗 小姐？

translation.en: Lemme tell you something. Next time you're looking for a partner in crime,
translation.zh: 下次你要找个搭档的话

translation.en: you're gonna have to aim higher than your grandfather.
translation.zh: 要找个比你爷爷好一点的

translation.en: -[whispers] He's soft in the head. -[Bart] I heard that!
translation.zh:
-他的脑子不好使
-我听到了！

translation.en: -[Ollie exhales] -Here. Can we go see this show?
translation.zh: 这个 我们可以去看这个吗？

translation.en: [Ollie] Sweeney Todd? You know that this has a lot of singing, right?
translation.zh:

translation.zh:
我站到台上大侃了一通
把一屋子的人都镇住了！ -彻底扭转了局面！
-你可真是巧舌如簧

translation.en: You silver-tongued devil, you.
translation.zh:
-彻底扭转了局面！
-你可真是巧舌如簧

translation.en: Everything I was saying was just right on the money, you know?
translation.zh: 我的每句话都说到了点子上

translation.en: Maybe that's 'cause you weren't slinging as much bullshit as you thought you were.
translation.zh: 可能是有些废话 你没来得及说出来

translation.en: "Get out there and play in the dirt"? -[laughs] -I mean, what… I made that up.
translation.zh: “出去玩泥巴”？那是我编的！

translation.en: Sounds pretty good to me. -Hey, Gert. -[Gertie] Hi.
translation.zh: 听起来不错 嘿 葛蒂

translation.en: The sad thing is, I had a greater sense of accomplishment from this stupid water-main thing
translation.zh: 可悲的是 这件事带来的成就感

translation.en: than anything else I've done in the past seven years.
translation.zh: 要大于我过去七年做过的所有的事

translation.en: I get it. You set out to do something and you did it.
translation.zh:
我明白
你决心做一件事 而且做成了

translation.en: So you feel drunk with power now. Makes sense.
translation.zh: 所以你现在有点飘起来了 这很合理

translation.en: That's just it. I was the youngest flack ever put in charge of an entire division--
translation.zh:
就是的 我是曼德尔-科斯历史上
最年轻的掌管整个部门的

translation.en: In the history of Mandel-Kirschner.
translation.zh: 新闻发言人

translation.en: -I know. -That's an accomplishment.
translation.zh:
-我知道
-这是种成就感

translation.en: Convincing a town to approve something that's already in their best interest?
translation.zh:
说服全镇的人同意一件
本来就符合他们利益的事？

translation.en: That's just delayed common sense. Yeah, but that's your life now.
translation.zh:
-迟来的常识
-对 但这是你的生活

translation.en: I mean, being the youngest flack in the history of blah, blah, blah…
translation.zh: 我是说 做有史以来最年轻的发言人

translation.en: That's not you anymore. I mean, that might never have been you.
translation.zh: 那就不再是你了 你以前不是这样的

translation.en: Oh, it was me. It was me with my own apartment…
translation.zh: 那正是以前的我 有自己的公寓

translation.en: -[chuckles] -…me richer, me with more self-respect.
translation.zh: 比现在更富有 更有自尊

translation.en: Like it or not, this is you.
translation.zh: 不管你喜不喜欢 这就是你

translation.en: I mean, forget about what you thought you were and just accept who you are.
translation.zh: 忘了过去的事 接受现实吧

translation.en: I guess I'll just get this. Gert, what are you doing?
translation.zh:
-拿这几部吧
-葛蒂 你忘了吗？

translation.en: I distinctly remember your father telling you you could get Dirty Dancing.
translation.zh:
我记得很清楚
你爸爸说过你可以看《辣身舞》的

translation.en: Oh, yeah! -He did! -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-噢 对呀！他是说过！
-是的

translation.en: Thanks for that, by the way.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Incidentally, she's been asking me when she's gonna grow boobies like yours.
translation.zh:
顺便说一下 她一直在问我
什么时候会有你这么大的胸脯

translation.en: -[laughs] Oh, my God! -She's seven, okay?
translation.zh:
-噢 天哪！
-她才七岁 好吗？

translation.en: If you want, I can give her the old boobie talk my mom gave me when I was a kid.
translation.zh:
你允许的话 我可以把小时候妈妈
给我讲过关于“胸脯”的话讲给她听

translation.en: Does that talk include using the word "knockers"?
translation.zh: 那里面有“奶子”这个词吗？

translation.en: -Oh!. -I'm just saying.
translation.zh: 我随便说说而已！

translation.en: I'm… I'm glad there's no, you know, awkwardness between us.
translation.zh: 我很高兴上周那件事之后

translation.en: After the… Well, the thing that happened last week with…
translation.zh: 你我之间没有觉得尴尬

translation.en: Ollie, I was gonna give you a mercy jump. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 奥利 我只是想“施舍”你一次

translation.en: The moment passed. It's no big deal.
translation.zh: 事情过去了 没什么的

translation.en: Just friends, right? Yeah, friends.
translation.zh:
-只是朋友 对吗？
-对 朋友

translation.en: -"Mercy jump." -[chuckles] -Stay away from my kid. -[laughs]
translation.zh: “施舍” 离我女儿远点

translation.en: -No, that's too round. -[Block] Shut up.
translation.zh:
-不对 切的太圆了
-闭嘴

translation.en: -Just make a little rounder-- -[Block] Shut up! -Just a little rounder on that edge-- -Shut up! Shut up.
translation.zh:
-闭嘴！
-做应该做的

translation.en: -Would you shut the hell up? -All right!
translation.zh:
-你他妈的能不能闭嘴？！
-好吧！

translation.en: There's people getting their throats cut in this thing.
translation.zh: 这里面有割人喉管的情节

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: And your father said you could do this for the show?
translation.zh: 你爸说你可以演这个？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Why the hell would he okay you singing this shit?
translation.zh: 他怎么会同意你演这个呢？

translation.en: Because I saw him and Maya naked in the shower.
translation.zh:
因为他和玛雅光着身子洗澡
被我看到了

translation.en: Oh, yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 噢 对

translation.en: That'll do it.
translation.zh: 哈哈！那是个把柄

translation.en: [Ollie] Can I speak with an Arthur Brickman, please?
translation.zh: 请亚瑟·布里克曼接电话

translation.en: -Ollie. -[Ollie] Arthur.
translation.zh:
-奥利
-亚瑟

translation.en: -Hey, man. How're you doing? -Good. How are you?
translation.zh:
-嘿 伙计
-你好吗？ -不错 你呢？
-还好 见到你真高兴

translation.en: -Good. Good to see you. -Good to see you.
translation.zh:
-不错 你呢？
-还好 见到你真高兴

translation.en: It was-- You know, the town voted unanimously,
translation.zh:
全镇的人一致通过了
关于供水管的决议

translation.en: -approved the water main, so… -You were always great with a crowd.
translation.zh:
全镇的人一致通过了
关于供水管的决议 你总是很擅长说服大众

translation.en: Well, except that… that once, of course.
translation.zh: 当然了 除了那次…

translation.en: But that's it. It was the polar opposite of the Fresh Prince incident.
translation.zh: 这次和活力王子那件事是完全不同的

translation.en: It was like I was on the top of my game.
translation.zh: 我好像又找回了感觉

translation.en: Which is why I wanted to see ya.
translation.zh: 所以过来找你

translation.en: Uh, I wanna ask you a favor. Yeah, anything, man. What?
translation.zh:
-呃 我想请你帮个忙
-尽管说 什么忙？

translation.en: Is there any way that you could get me an interview with your firm?
translation.zh: 能在你的公司给我安排一次面试吗？

translation.en: You're serious?
translation.zh: 你是认真的？

translation.en: I thought it was weird that you wanted to eat here.
translation.zh: 我正奇怪你为什么要请我吃饭

translation.en: Oh, I know it's gonna be tough, don't get me wrong. Tough? [scoffs]
translation.zh:
-我知道这会很难
-难？

translation.en: Ollie, uh, you… you called a roomful of press a bunch of jerk-offs
translation.zh: 奥利 你把一屋子的记者叫做混蛋

translation.en: and… and trashed a client whose one of the biggest movie stars on the planet.
translation.zh: 还把最红的大明星说得一文不值

translation.en: He wasn't big then.
translation.zh:
-他那时没还这么出名
-对 但他现在是

translation.en: No, but he is now. You wanna know how big?
translation.zh:
-他那时没还这么出名
-对 但他现在是 你想知道他有多出名吗？
我离开曼德尔-科斯纳后

translation.en: When I left Mandel-Kirschner,
translation.zh:
你想知道他有多出名吗？
我离开曼德尔-科斯纳后

translation.en: there were some firms that wouldn't even look at my resume because I…
translation.zh: 有些公司根本就不看我的简历

translation.en: No offense, but because I worked under you.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 只因为我在你手下干过

translation.en: I've only… I've only been at Angellotti a year now…
translation.zh: 我在安杰罗蒂才做了一年

translation.en: You know what, man? Forget I asked. Don't worry about it. Seriously.
translation.zh: 就当我没说 没关系的

translation.en: -It's-- I was stupid. I got carried away. -No, le… let me finish.
translation.zh:
-我太蠢了 当时没控制住自己
-不 让我说完

translation.en: What I was gonna say was…
translation.zh: 我想说的是

translation.en: I've been waiting years to be in a position -to be able to help you out, and now I am. -[sentimental music playing]
translation.zh:
我等了几年就是为了能帮上你的忙
现在我可以了

translation.en: It's not gonna be an easy sell, but um,
translation.zh: 这不是很容易 但是…

translation.en: I think I can get you in a room with Angellotti himself. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我会安排你和安杰罗蒂见面

translation.en: -[Ollie] Thank you so much. -Of course.
translation.zh:
-太谢谢你了
-客气什么

translation.en: You know, you're a lot more affectionate than I remember.
translation.zh: 你现在更具亲和力了

translation.en: Uh, it's just-- I miss it so much, you know?
translation.zh: 我只是很怀念过去 知道吗？

translation.en: It's the only thing I was ever any good at.
translation.zh: 这是我唯一擅长的

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Ollie] Oh, this is great. I can move back here.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我又能回来了

translation.en: I can put Gertie in a really good, expensive private school. I can…
translation.zh: 我可以送葛蒂去上好的私立学校

translation.en: I can get her a nanny, you know?
translation.zh: 再给她找个保姆

translation.en: It'll be like that whole Fresh Prince thing never even happened.
translation.zh: 回到以前 像什么都没发生过一样

translation.en: Well, I'll… I'll work on the old man when I get back to the office and I'll call you tonight if it's a go.
translation.zh:
我现在回去帮你联系
晚上有信息了 我给你打电话

translation.en: Oh, great.
translation.zh: 噢 太好了

translation.en: [Gertie] ♪ Excuse me ♪
translation.zh: 失陪下

translation.en: -[Ollie] ♪ Psst ♪ -♪ Dear, see to the customers ♪
translation.zh:
-嘘
-亲爱的 招呼顾客

translation.en: -♪ Psst ♪ -♪ Guess what's the… ♪
translation.zh:
-嘘
-猜猜看

translation.en: -♪ Quick now ♪ -♪ My heart's a-flutter ♪
translation.zh:
-快点！
-我心中悸动不安

translation.en: -[Ollie] ♪ When I pound the floor ♪ -[Gertie] ♪ Pound the floor ♪
translation.zh:
-当我跺脚的时候
-当我跺脚

translation.en: ♪ It's a signal to show that I'm Ready to go when I pound the floor… ♪
translation.zh: 那便是我准备好的信号

translation.en: -[telephone ringing] -I have to get the phone.
translation.zh: 我去接电话

translation.en: Come on, Pop. Do Dad's part.
translation.zh: 来呀 爷爷！你演爸爸的角色

translation.en: -Me? -[Gertie] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我？
-对

translation.en: -You can do it. -[telephone ringing]
translation.zh: 去呀

translation.en: Hello? Hey, Arthur.
translation.zh: 喂？嘿 亚瑟

translation.en: You're kidding.
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: ♪ I'll pound three times Three times… ♪
translation.zh: 我会跺三下脚

translation.en: Why do I have to sing your dad's part? I'm supposed to be the guy who gets clipped.
translation.zh:
我干嘛要演你爸爸的角色？
我应该是被杀死的那个人

translation.en: You are, but you're Dad's understudy too. What the hell is that?
translation.zh:
-对 但你也是爸爸的“替角”
-什么是替角？

translation.en: It means if Daddy breaks a leg, then you do his part for him.
translation.zh: 要是爸爸摔断了腿 你就得顶替他

translation.en: So, come on, try it again. You're doing good.
translation.zh:
-再来一次
-做得不错

translation.en: ♪ I'll pound three times-- ♪
translation.zh: 我跺三下

translation.en: ♪ Three times! ♪
translation.zh: 三下！

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. I'm supposed to be the understudy now.
translation.zh: 等等！我现在是替角才对

translation.en: I cannot work like this. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 这样我演不了 对不起

translation.en: This is no way to run a show. [chuckles] You were good.
translation.zh:
-根本不该这么演
-演得的不错

translation.en: You can go back to waiting in the wings, Tommy Tune.
translation.zh: 你可以下去休息了 汤米·图恩

translation.en: I'll be doing my own singing henceforth.
translation.zh: 我自己来接着唱

translation.en: -Who's Tommy Tune? -[Ollie] Tommy Tune is a man
translation.zh:
-谁是汤米·图恩？
-汤米·图恩是个演员

translation.en: that you can get a chance to see live and on Broadway
translation.zh: 在我们搬回纽约之后

translation.en: when we move back to New York City!
translation.zh:
你就有机会去百老汇
看他现场演出了！

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-什么？

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-什么？

translation.en: Yeah, what?
translation.zh: 是啊 说的什么？

translation.en: Well, I was just on the phone with an old friend of mine that I used to work with at Mandell Kirschner.
translation.zh:
我刚和以前曼德尔-科斯纳的
同事通过电话

translation.en: Anyway, I had lunch with him, and I asked him if he'd get me an interview with his new firm, right?
translation.zh:
我请他吃午饭
让他帮我在他公司谋个职位

translation.en: Jesus, another interview, Ollie? Come on, when are you gonna learn?
translation.zh:
老天啊 又是面试 奥利？
你难道还没长记性？

translation.en: Well, smart guy, he just called me, said he sat down with his boss,
translation.zh: 他刚打电话来 说他坐在老板身边

translation.en: sold me to his boss like I was the cure for cancer.
translation.zh: 轻松就把我推荐了出去

translation.en: And It just so happens that a little spot has opened up in their music department.
translation.zh: 正好音乐部有个空缺

translation.en: Boom! After six years of being a pariah, I'm gonna get back in!
translation.zh: 在当了六年的贱民之后 我终于回来了！

translation.en: I'm talking about no more street sweeper,
translation.zh: 我再也不用扫大街

translation.en: no more picking up garbage, and no more water main.
translation.zh: 再也不用拣垃圾、修水管了！

translation.en: I'm talking press lines, I'm talking about parties.
translation.zh: 我们会参加新闻发布会 宴会！

translation.en: I'm talking about a Westside address.
translation.zh: 住西区的高档住宅

translation.en: I'm talking about a good school for Gertie.
translation.zh: 再给葛蒂找个好学校！

translation.en: But I already go to a good school.
translation.zh: 我现在的学校就很好！

translation.en: Yes, honey, but you're gonna go to a way, way better school in New York City.
translation.zh:
是的 亲爱的
你要去纽约上更好的学校

translation.en: You're gonna be able to take the subway to school. Won't that be fun?
translation.zh: 每天坐地铁上学 好玩吧？

translation.en: But the subway's full of junkies and mole-men.
translation.zh: 地铁里全是流浪汉和坏蛋

translation.en: Well, they are.
translation.zh:
-对啊
-别听爷爷的

translation.en: Don't listen to Pop. What do I tell you? He makes things up.
translation.zh:
-对啊
-别听爷爷的 我告诉过你 他的话不可信

translation.en: -You'll see. The subways are great. -I don't wanna see.
translation.zh:
-你坐过就知道了 地铁棒极了
-我不想坐

translation.en: I don't wanna go to a school up in the city. I wanna go to my school.
translation.zh: 我不想去那 我要去我的学校

translation.en: Honey, It's gonna be too far of a drive for me to come back down here
translation.zh: 亲爱的 那样我得每天早晨开车

translation.en: to take you to school in New Jersey every morning.
translation.zh: 跑很远的路送你

translation.en: So let's not move to the city. Let's stay here with Pop.
translation.zh: 那么我们就别搬了 和爷爷住一起吧

translation.en: Sweetheart, I'm too old… [chuckles] …to be living with my father.
translation.zh:
亲爱的 我是大人了
不能再住父亲家里

translation.en: I need to get my own place.
translation.zh: 我需要有自己的房子

translation.en: And Pop, I mean, look at him, he's a mad-dog.
translation.zh: 还有…瞧爷爷 他总是找事

translation.en: He doesn't want us around here, getting in his way, cramping his style.
translation.zh:
他不想让我们在这碍他的事
占他的空间

translation.en: Do you, Pop?
translation.zh: 对吗 爷爷？

translation.en: That's all horseshit.
translation.zh: 全是放屁

translation.en: You know, thanks, Pop.
translation.zh: 谢谢了 爷爷

translation.en: I don't wanna move to the city. I like it here.
translation.zh: 我不想搬走 我喜欢这里

translation.en: Pop says you can live here as long as you want.
translation.zh: 你想在这住多久都行

translation.en: Baby, remember when I took you to see Sweeney Todd?
translation.zh:
宝贝 记得我带你
去看《理发师陶德》吗？

translation.en: How much fun was that? We had a good time, right?
translation.zh: 多好看啊 我们很开心 对吗？

translation.en: I mean… if we move to New York City, we can do that every night.
translation.zh: 等搬到了纽约 每晚都可以去看！

translation.en: Except for the nights you're working, of course.
translation.zh: 当然了 除非你要工作

translation.en: You know what? Why don't you shut up for a second, okay?
translation.zh: 你把嘴闭上一会儿 行吗？

translation.en: I'm trying to talk to my daughter.
translation.zh: 我在和我的女儿谈话

translation.en: You love New York City. You told me you loved the city.
translation.zh: 你告诉过我 你喜欢纽约的

translation.en: -No, I didn't. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我不喜欢

translation.en: -[Gertie] I said it was okay. -Jesus Christ!
translation.zh:
-我只是说还行
-老天！

translation.en: -[Gertie] I said I like Highlands better. -[Bart] Yeah. [Gertie] Why would you want some other job anyway, Dad?
translation.zh:
我说我还是更喜欢海兰德
你找个别的工作不行吗 爸爸？

translation.en: You get to ride the Batmobile.
translation.zh: 你可以开蝙蝠侠的车子！

translation.en: Baby, Daddy doesn't wanna drive the Batmobile!
translation.zh: 宝贝 爸爸不想开蝙蝠侠的车子！

translation.en: Daddy wants to eat sushi. Daddy wants to hail cabs.
translation.zh: 爸爸想吃寿司！想坐出租车！

translation.en: Daddy wants to have a doorman.
translation.zh: 想雇个门卫！

translation.en: Daddy wants to lord it over magazine editors.
translation.zh: 爸爸想向杂志记者们逞威风！

translation.en: Daddy loved his old job, and he's missed it every day since he's been gone.
translation.zh:
爸爸喜欢以前的工作
一直都想重操旧业

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Daddy wants to do that job. Daddy doesn't wanna pick up garbage for the rest of his life!
translation.zh:
爸爸想要那个工作
不要永远都当垃圾佬！

translation.en: But you told everybody at the meeting that your job's good
translation.zh: 但你在集会上说你不必穿西服上班

translation.en: because you don't have to wear a suit.
translation.zh: 这样的工作很好

translation.en: Yes, but Daddy was just saying that to get them to say yes to a water main.
translation.zh: 爸爸那样说只是为了争取他们的同意

translation.en: So you were just lying to everybody?
translation.zh: 你对大家撒谎？

translation.en: Look, okay, I'll tell you what. I'll go to the meeting, all right?
translation.zh: 这样吧 面试我还是要去

translation.en: If I don't like what the man says, then I won't take the job.
translation.zh:
要是我不喜欢那人说的
我就不要这个工作

translation.en: Now you're lying to me!
translation.zh: 你现在又来骗我！

translation.en: All right, look, young lady! I'm gonna go to this job interview on Monday
translation.zh: 好了 不管你高兴不高兴

translation.en: whether you like it or not.
translation.zh: 周一我都要去面试！

translation.en: -Wait, this Monday? -Yes.
translation.zh:
等等 周一？ -对
-奥利 周一你不能去

translation.en: -Ollie, you can't go on Monday. -Why?
translation.zh:
-对
-奥利 周一你不能去 -为什么？
-那天是我演出的日子！

translation.en: Because that's the day of my show!
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-那天是我演出的日子！

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: It is, isn't it?
translation.zh: 真是不凑巧

translation.en: Well, it's at 4:00, so I can, you know, I can just skip-- make it back in time.
translation.zh:
那么 面试是在四点
我能及时赶回来的

translation.en: But my show's at 5:00.
translation.zh: 可我的演出是在五点！

translation.en: On what planet are you gonna get back here by 5:00
translation.zh: 你四点在纽约和别人会面

translation.en: if you've got a meeting in the city at 4:00?
translation.zh: 五点怎么可能赶得回来？

translation.en: Just lay off me for a second! I forgot about the show.
translation.zh: 让我想一下！我把演出的事给忘了

translation.en: How could you forget? What are you, stupid?
translation.zh: 你怎么能忘了呢？你傻子啊？

translation.en: Gertie, this job is very important to Daddy.
translation.zh: 葛蒂 这个工作对爸爸很重要

translation.en: What about my show? Isn't that important to you?
translation.zh: 那我的演出对你不重要吗？

translation.en: Yes, honey, that's even more important to me.
translation.zh: 当然重要 亲爱的 比什么都重要

translation.en: Then don't go to your stupid meeting about your stupid new job in the stupid city.
translation.zh:
那你就别去那个愚蠢的城市！
为了愚蠢的工作而参加愚蠢的面试

translation.en: All right that's enough, young lady. You know what? I don't want you in the show anymore.
translation.zh:
-够了 小姐！
-我甚至觉得戏里不该有你！

translation.en: You're not even a good Sweeney Todd anyway.
translation.zh: 理发师陶德你演得一点都不好

translation.en: Pop's way better. Even Uncle Greenie and Uncle Block are better than you.
translation.zh:
爷爷要好得多 连格里尼叔叔
和布洛克叔叔都比你演得好

translation.en: Those men are not your uncles!
translation.zh: 他们不是你的叔叔！

translation.en: Oh, no, but we're good enough to build sets for her show, I got it.
translation.zh: 对 我们做的布景还不赖吧？

translation.en: Sorry, I didn't mean that. Where are you going?
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是那个意思 你去哪？

translation.en: I don't wanna be around you. I don't want you to come to the show to watch it either.
translation.zh:
我不想再见到你！
明天的演出我也不想见到你！

translation.en: Oh, come on! I don't! You're not allowed to come 'cause I don't even like you anymore!
translation.zh:
-噢 别这样！
-我不想！我甚至不再喜欢你了！

translation.en: Get back here, young lady. Hey! I'm talking to you!
translation.zh: 回来 小姐！嘿！我在和你说话！

translation.en: Hey, young lady? Get back here, young lady.
translation.zh: 嘿 回来 小姐！

translation.en: No! You can't tell me what to do. I don't have to do anything you say!
translation.zh:
不！你别再想指使我了！
你说什么我也不听了！

translation.en: -Yes, you do. -Why?
translation.zh:
-你必须听！
-为什么？

translation.en: -Because I'm your father, that's why! -So what?
translation.zh:
我是你爸爸 这就是原因！ -那又怎么样？
-别冲我大喊大叫 葛楚德！

translation.en: Don't you yell at me, Gertrude.
translation.zh:
-那又怎么样？
-别冲我大喊大叫 葛楚德！

translation.en: I'll yell at you all I want! Blah! Blah! Blah!
translation.zh: 我高兴喊就喊！ 我不会去那个愚蠢的城市！

translation.en: -I'm not moving to the stupid city! -All right, that's it.
translation.zh:
我不会去那个愚蠢的城市！ 够了 我们搬过去
你会喜欢上那儿的 就这么定了

translation.en: You are moving to the city and you're gonna like it, and that's the end!
translation.zh:
够了 我们搬过去
你会喜欢上那儿的 就这么定了

translation.en: I hate you! I hate you! I wish you'd died, not Mommy!
translation.zh:
我讨厌你！
我希望死的是你 而不是妈妈！

translation.en: I hate you right back, you little shit!
translation.zh: 我也讨厌你 小混蛋！

translation.en: You and your mother took my life away, and I just want it back!
translation.zh:
你和你母亲夺走了我的生活！
而我现在要夺回来！

translation.en: God, I'm sorry, I'm sorry sweetheart. I didn't mean…
translation.zh: 对不起 亲爱的 我不是有意

translation.en: -Get off me! Get off of me! -I'm sorry…
translation.zh:
-把手拿开！
-对不起 把手拿开！

translation.en: -[sighs] -What the hell's the matter with you?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么了？

translation.en: ♪ Well, I've been afraid of changing ♪
♪ 'Cause I've built my life around you ♪
translation.zh: （贤妻良母 英年早逝）

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh:
-嘿
-嘿

translation.en: What happened to you the other night? You just sort of took off.
translation.zh: 那天晚上你怎么了？不辞而别

translation.en: lt looked to me like you guys needed a little privacy.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们需要一点隐私

translation.en: What I really needed was a little backup.
translation.zh: 我真正需要的是一点支持

translation.en: She's a kid, Ollie. Kids don't weather change well.
translation.zh:
她还是个孩子 奥利
孩子不喜欢变化

translation.en: I mean, in a few years, you won't be able to keep her out of Manhattan.
translation.zh:
我是说几年后
你想赶她出曼哈顿都赶不走

translation.en: But for now, she just wants what she knows.
translation.zh: 但现在 她只想要她熟悉的东西

translation.en: So do I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Yeah, but is that even what you know anymore?
translation.zh: 嗯 但是你真的熟悉那些吗？

translation.en: Oh, Jesus. You too?
translation.zh: 噢 天哪 你也这样？

translation.en: You want your old life back. I get it. Big-money job, out of your old man's house.
translation.zh: 你想过以前的生活 赚大钱 住别墅

translation.en: It's not like it doesn't make any sense.
translation.zh: 你的想法很合理

translation.en: Yeah. So?
translation.zh: 是啊 所以呢？

translation.en: That's your life that you want back, not theirs.
translation.zh: 那是你想过的生活 不是他们的

translation.en: I mean, this is their life. What you're sort of saying to everybody who loves you
translation.zh:
这才是他们的生活
可你对那些爱你的人说

translation.en: is that what we have isn't good enough for you.
translation.zh: 你现在过的生活 对你来说还不够好

translation.en: So it's just upsetting everybody, you know?
translation.zh: 你让每个人都失望了 你知道吗？

translation.en: -Everybody? -Oh. What, me? [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-每个人？
-噢 什么？我吗？

translation.en: I mean, it's not like we've got some big romance…
translation.zh:
我们之间不可能
有什么轰轰烈烈的爱情发生

translation.en: [chuckles] …going on or anything. We're just friends, right?
translation.zh:
我们之间不可能
有什么轰轰烈烈的爱情发生 我们只是朋友 对吗？

translation.en: Did you ever wonder if, uh, maybe someday it might…
translation.zh: 你有没有想过 或许有一天我和你

translation.en: be more than that?
translation.zh: 不止是朋友？

translation.en: For about two seconds, before you had me hiding in the shower from your kid. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 有那么一会儿 在你把我藏到浴室前

translation.en: Look, Ollie, I like you,
translation.zh: 听着 奥利 我喜欢你 但是…

translation.en: but… I'm not gonna be all heartbroken 'cause you're leaving town.
translation.zh: 听着 奥利 我喜欢你 但是… 我不会因为你的离开而伤心欲绝的

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Even if I took this job in the city,
translation.zh: 就算是我在那边工作了

translation.en: I'd still come back down here and visit my old man.
translation.zh: 我也会常回来看那些老伙计们

translation.en: And you.
translation.zh: 还有你

translation.en: Why? I mean, you think I'm gonna stick around here for much longer?
translation.zh: 为什么？你以为我会在这里待多久？

translation.en: Maya… Ollie…
translation.zh:
-玛雅
-奥利

translation.en: I gotta get back to work.
translation.zh: 我要回去工作了

translation.en: If, uh… if I don't… If I don't see you at the show,
translation.zh: 要是我没在演出上看到你

translation.en: give me a call sometime when you get all settled up in the big city.
translation.zh: 你在大都市里安顿好了 给我个电话

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: [sighs] Shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Hi, Daddy.
translation.zh: 嗨 爸爸

translation.en: Hey, baby. I'm sorry. I didn't mean to wake you up.
translation.zh: 宝贝 对不起 我不是故意的

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Listen. I'm sorry for yelling at you the other night.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 那天对你大吼大叫

translation.en: I was wrong. And I didn't mean any of the things that I said.
translation.zh:
是我不对
我说的那些话都不是有心的

translation.en: I know. Neither did I.
translation.zh: 我知道 我也是的

translation.en: Daddy? Yeah?
translation.zh:
-爸爸？
-什么？

translation.en: Did Mommy like living in the city?
translation.zh: 妈妈喜欢住在都市里吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she did. She loved it.
translation.zh: 是的 她喜欢大都市

translation.en: Then I guess I'll love it too.
translation.zh: 那么我也会喜欢的

translation.en: Thanks, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You know, I still might make it to your show tomorrow, if the traffic's not too bad.
translation.zh:
要是明天交通状况好的话
我还能赶回来参加演出

translation.en: I won't be mad if you miss it. I understand.
translation.zh: 回不来我也不会生气的 我能理解

translation.en: Okay, sweetie. Go back to sleep. I love you.
translation.zh: 好了 睡吧 宝贝 我爱你

translation.en: Good night, Daddy.
translation.zh: 晚安 爸爸

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: George Clooney's office for Tony on line one.
translation.zh: 乔治·克鲁尼办公室 一号线找托尼

translation.en: The Angellotti Company. One moment, please.
translation.zh: 安杰罗蒂公司 请稍等

translation.en: -Can I help you? -Yes. Uh, my name's Oliver Trinke,
translation.zh:
-我能帮您吗？
-是的 我叫奥利弗·亭基我来见
亚瑟·布里克曼和安杰罗蒂先生

translation.en: and I'm here to see Arthur Brickman, uh, and Mr. Angellotti.
translation.zh:
我叫奥利弗·亭基我来见
亚瑟·布里克曼和安杰罗蒂先生

translation.en: Okay. Mr. Trinke is here.
translation.zh: 好的 亭基先生到了

translation.en: Okay, I will.
translation.zh: 好的 我会的

translation.en: Uh, they're gonna be about ten more minutes.
translation.zh: 他们十分钟后见您

translation.en: [click tongue] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You can have a seat. [chuckles] Right. Right.
translation.zh:
-您可以先坐那边休息
-好的

translation.en: [man] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Oh, my God. Hi! [gasps, chuckles]
translation.zh: 噢 天哪 嗨！

translation.en: [man] Uh, I'm here to see Brad.
translation.zh: 我来见布拉德

translation.en: Yes. He's expecting you, sir.
translation.zh: 是的！他在等你

translation.en: He apologizes, but he's stuck in traffic. He's just a few blocks away,
translation.zh:
他很抱歉 在附近遇到了堵车
应该很快就过来了

translation.en: so why don't you just have a seat and I'll… I'll let him know that you've arrived.
translation.zh: 您先坐一下 我告诉他您到了

translation.en: [man] Well, thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: They love to keep you waiting, don't they?
translation.zh: 他们喜欢让人等 对不？

translation.en: Excuse me? Oh, no, I was saying they… they love to keep you waiting.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-他们喜欢让人等

translation.en: Right. Yeah. Yeah, they do.
translation.zh: 对 是啊 他们就这样

translation.en: I think they think it gives them the psychological edge, you know?
translation.zh:
他们以为这样做
会有点心理优势 对吧？

translation.en: Well, it's about to give them the edge of my ass,
translation.zh: 他们只能得到我屁股的优势

translation.en: 'cause that's all they're gonna see when I'm walking out that door.
translation.zh:
我要是转身就走的话
他们只能看到我的屁股

translation.en: You know anything about these guys?
translation.zh: 你对这个公司了解多少？

translation.en: Uh, only that they're the fastest-growing--
translation.zh: 我只知道他们是这一行

translation.en: "Growing firm in the business." Yes, I read that article too.
translation.zh:
“发展最快的一家公司”
是啊 那篇文章我也看过

translation.en: All right, well, you know as much as I do.
translation.zh: 对 那么…咱俩知道的一样多

translation.en: I guess that means they know what they're doing.
translation.zh: 这说明他们做得还不错

translation.en: I suppose. Unless these publicists hire other publicists
translation.zh:
可能吧 要么就是这些广告商们
找了别的广告人来给他们做广告

translation.en: -to get the word out for them. -[Will] Right.
translation.zh:
可能吧 要么就是这些广告商们
找了别的广告人来给他们做广告 对 然后那些广告商们
雇了自己的广告人

translation.en: Yeah, and then those publicists hire their own publicists
translation.zh:
对 然后那些广告商们
雇了自己的广告人

translation.en: to help spin the good publicity they created for these publicists.
translation.zh:
来帮那些广告商们
吹嘘他们的广告能力

translation.en: Of course, you know, knowing publicists, they probably hire publicists
translation.zh:
当然了 了解广告人
他们就会雇佣广告人

translation.en: to promote the fact that they spun the publicity
translation.zh: 来吹嘘他们雇佣了别的广告人

translation.en: that they hired the other publicists to spin.
translation.zh: 来推销他们自己的广告实力的事实

translation.en: -Oh, man! So what do you do? -I'm a publicist.
translation.zh:
-噢 伙计！你是干什么的？
-我是个广告人

translation.en: I didn't realize I was sitting here talking to an Angellotti man.
translation.zh:
我没发现自己和一个安杰罗蒂的
员工坐在一起聊天

translation.en: Well, to tell you the truth, I'm… I'm not an Angellotti man.
translation.zh: 说实话 我不是安杰罗蒂员工

translation.en: At least not yet. I'm here trying to get a job, so…
translation.zh:
起码现在还不是
我是来这里找工作的

translation.en: Yeah, well, you know, these guys have been trying to steal me from my publicist ever since my last flick came out.
translation.zh:
我上部电影公映后 这些家伙们
就想把我从别的广告商那拉过来

translation.en: Oh, the… the robot movie, right? Oh, yeah. You saw it?
translation.zh:
-噢 那个机器人电影 对吗？
-噢 对了 你看过？

translation.en: I haven't gotten around to it yet. I'm gonna… I'm gonna…
translation.zh: 我还没看 我打算…

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Thanks a lot for the support, though, man.
translation.zh: 还是很感谢你的支持 伙计

translation.en: -I wan… I wanna see it… -You know what? It's not that good. -It's not that good. -[laughs]
translation.zh:
-我想看…
-知道吗？片子没那么好看

translation.en: I have a kid. I don't get a chance to get out and see movies
translation.zh: 我有个孩子 没机会出去看电影

translation.en: unless they have singing crabs in them or something.
translation.zh: 除非里面有唱歌的螃蟹

translation.en: Singing crabs. I saw that one. That means you have a girl.
translation.zh:
唱歌的螃蟹？
我看过 这么说你有个女儿

translation.en: -That's right. That's right. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -How old is she? -Uh, she's seven.
translation.zh:
-多大了？
-七岁

translation.en: Yeah, cool. I got a girl and two boys.
translation.zh: 是吗？我有一个女儿 两个儿子

translation.en: Three kids?
translation.zh: 三个孩子？

translation.en: God. How do you find time to make all those blockbusters?
translation.zh: 天啊 哪来的时间去拍电影呢？

translation.en: Shoot, if I didn't have all them kids,
translation.zh: 要不是因为有这么多孩子

translation.en: I wouldn't have to make these blockbusters.
translation.zh: 我才不会去拍电影呢

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 噢 是啊

translation.en: It's cool, though, isn't it?
translation.zh:
-那很酷 对吧？
-拍电影？

translation.en: Making blockbusters? You tell me.
translation.zh:
-那很酷 对吧？
-拍电影？ -你说呢
-我说的是做父母

translation.en: Being a parent, funny man.
translation.zh:
-你说呢
-我说的是做父母

translation.en: It has its moments.
translation.zh: 有时候很酷

translation.en: -What's your daughter's name? -Uh, Gertrude.
translation.zh:
-你女儿叫什么？
-葛楚德

translation.en: [click tongue] Damn! Why'd you do that to that girl, man?
translation.zh: 可恶！你怎么给她起这么一个名字

translation.en: -[laughs] -Did you lose a bet?
translation.zh:
-打赌输了？
-不是

translation.en: No. No, it was my wife's name.
translation.zh:
-打赌输了？
-不是 -这曾经是我妻子的名字
-“曾经”？好吧 我来猜猜

translation.en: "Was"? Your wife-- Okay, let me guess. She took you for half
translation.zh:
-这曾经是我妻子的名字
-“曾经”？好吧 我来猜猜 她给孩子起了葛蒂这个名字后
就和你离婚 并带走了一半的财产？

translation.en: after she saddled the kid with the name "Gert."
translation.zh:
她给孩子起了葛蒂这个名字后
就和你离婚 并带走了一半的财产？

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't blame it on her. I saddled the kid with the name "Gert."
translation.zh: 不能怪她 是我给孩子起名叫葛蒂的

translation.en: She… she died at childbirth, so…
translation.zh: 她难产死了 所以…

translation.en: -Oh… -No, no, no, it's… I just-- I feel like an asshole, man.
translation.zh:
-没事的 这…
-我真混蛋 伙计

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Don't worry about it. You didn't know.
translation.zh:
-别在意
-不 听着 我对刚才的话很抱歉

translation.en: No, listen, I'm… I'm really sorry about that.
translation.zh:
-别在意
-不 听着 我对刚才的话很抱歉 我也没去看你的电影
这下扯平了 相信我

translation.en: I didn't see your movie, so we're even. Trust me.
translation.zh:
我也没去看你的电影
这下扯平了 相信我

translation.en: You know, this is exactly why people don't talk to each other when they sitting in waiting rooms, right?
translation.zh:
这正是为什么人们不在休息室
搭讪聊天的原因 对吗？

translation.en: Probably.
translation.zh: 很可能是 我跟你说

translation.en: Although, I gotta tell ya, the simple fact that the guy who wrote
translation.zh: 很可能是 我跟你说 写“父母缺乏理解”的那些个家伙

translation.en: Parents Just Don't Understand is now a parent himself,
translation.zh: 写“父母缺乏理解”的那些个家伙

translation.en: -I think completely makes up for it. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 纯粹是胡编乱造

translation.en: Oh, man. We don't, though, do we?
translation.zh: 噢 伙计 我们不是 对吗？

translation.en: -What's that? -Understand.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-理解

translation.en: I mean, these kids today, from the door, man, they got it all over us.
translation.zh: 现在的孩子们像大人一样什么都懂

translation.en: My daughter has it all over me, I can tell you that.
translation.zh: 给你说 我女儿就是个小大人

translation.en: -Yeah, my middle one, my son? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 是呀 我家二小子

translation.en: Every time I walk out of the house in the morning,
translation.zh: 在我每次早上出门的时候都要问

translation.en: he says, "Daddy, how far you love me?"
translation.zh: “爸爸 你爱我有多远?”

translation.en: I always pick somewhere close, and be like, "I love you to that table, man."
translation.zh:
我总是挑近的说
“我爱你犹如从这里到桌子那么远”

translation.en: "I know, you don't." "You love me all the way to the moon and back down to the dirt."
translation.zh:
“不对 你爱我犹如从地球到月亮
然后再从月亮回到地球这么远”

translation.en: -[chuckles] -That's great.
translation.zh: 说得太好了

translation.en: It takes everything I got to walk out of the house.
translation.zh: 我真是舍不得离开他们

translation.en: You get to spend time with them on the set, though, right?
translation.zh:
你总是设法
抽出时间陪孩子们 是吗？

translation.en: [Will] Oh, yeah. But if I was a smart man, I wouldn't be sittin' here right now.
translation.zh:
是的 我要是个聪明人的话
就不会坐在这儿

translation.en: I'd be at home playing in the dirt with my kids.
translation.zh:
我应该在家里
和我的孩子们一起玩泥巴

translation.en: But we all know that I'm not famous 'cause of my brains.
